video.title: Clay Aiken avoids gay questions from paparazzi at Spamalot
video.description: Clay Aiken, who finally came out as being homosexual just weeks ago, runs as fast as he can to get away from paparazzi and avoid questions about his being gay outside the theater where he performs in 'Spamalot' on Broadway. Photographers try to keep up with Clay and his bodyguard, but Clay beats them in the race to, where else, but the back door.
